price: 25.  Ce jour-là, Allah leur donnera leur juste et pleine rétribution, et eux sauront qu’Allah est la Vérité évidente.
arabic: يَوۡمَئِذٖ يُوَفِّيهِمُ ٱللَّهُ دِينَهُمُ ٱلۡحَقَّ وَيَعۡلَمُونَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلۡحَقُّ ٱلۡمُبِينُ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: yawma-idhin yuwaffīhimu al-lahu dīnahumu al-ḥaqa wayaʿlamūna anna al-laha huwa al-ḥaqu al-mubīnu
translations: Allah will pay them in full
Allah will pay them in full
